column4: Hi all, Who may I talk to about a couple of questions that I got.
Ok, I am running the live CD of Ubuntu, and it does not see any of my hard drives, is this normal on live CD?
Ok, I am running the live CD of Ubuntu, and it does not see any of my hard drives, is this normal on live CD?
run this in a terminal: "sudo mkdir /mnt/win; sudo mount -t ntfs -o uid=1000 /dev/hda1 /mnt/win; cd /mnt/win"
